messages.alpha: The {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters
messages.alpha_num: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
messages.alpha_dash: The {_field_} field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
messages.alpha_spaces: The {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
messages.between: The {_field_} field must be between {min} and {max}
messages.confirmed: The {_field_} field confirmation does not match
messages.digits: The {_field_} field must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
messages.dimensions: The {_field_} field must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
messages.email: The {_field_} field must be a valid email
messages.excluded: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
messages.ext: The {_field_} field is not a valid file
messages.image: The {_field_} field must be an image
messages.integer: The {_field_} field must be an integer
messages.max_value: The {_field_} field must be {max} or less
messages.max: The {_field_} field may not be greater than {length} characters
messages.mimes: The {_field_} field must have a valid file type
messages.min_value: The {_field_} field must be {min} or more
messages.min: The {_field_} field must be at least {length} characters
messages.numeric: The {_field_} field may only contain numeric characters
messages.oneOf: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
messages.size: The {_field_} field size must be less than {size}KB
messages.decimal: The {_field_} field must contain only decimal values

header.title: Header menu
header.subtitle: There are two types of header: for employer and for employee.

quests.title: Quests
quests.subtitle: General list of job offers published on the platform.

employees.title: Employees
employees.subtitle: General list of employees registered on the platform.

myQuests.title: My quests
myQuests.subtitle: All job offers you interact with.

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.subtitle: Your WorkQuest wallet, where WQT token and WUSD stablecoin transactions are available. It can also be used to work with platform instruments.

instruments.title: Instruments
instruments.subtitle: DeFi functionality that includes referral program, 2P2 insurance, retirement savings, savings product, liquidity mining, and landing.

chats.title: Chats
chats.subtitle: Communication between employee and employer, group communication and saving important chats.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: All important notifications related to your profile and platform updates.

profile.title: My profile
profile.subtitle: Access to the profile page of an employee or employer with basic information about them.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Change profile information, social network, change password and security settings.

disputes.title: Disputes
disputes.subtitle: Disputes on your quests, decisions, status and other information.

logout.title: Logout
logout.subtitle: Logout from your profile to the main page of the platform.

retirement.title: Retirement program
retirement.subtitle: That will generate an annual percentage of profit on the amount of savings.

referral.title: Referral program
referral.subtitle: Is a program to expand the user base of the platform, where everyone receives a reward for inviting new users

P2P.title: P2P insurance
P2P.subtitle: Decentralized insurance where fund members manage the insurance fund themselves by voting for important decisions.

savings.title: Savings product
savings.subtitle: Brings additional income in the form of annual interest.

lending.title: Lending
lending.subtitle: The ability to take out a loan or issue a loan for a specific period and interest rate.

liquidity.title: Liquidity mining
liquidity.subtitle: Providing liquidity to pools to receive rewards based on your amount of liquidity in the pool.

bridge.title: Bridge
bridge.subtitle: Most secure and fast way to bring cross-chain assets between WorkNet, ETH and BSC.

staking.title: Staking
staking.subtitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit ut aliquam, purus sit amet luctus venenatis

delivery.title: Fixed delivery
delivery.subtitle: After the employee has determined the optimal job offer and consented to the execution of the quest, an agreement is concluded between the employee and the employer.

short.title: Short-term
short.subtitle: A quest that needs to be completed over the coming days. To indicate short-term delivery (from 24 to 72 hours), you need to start the quest as soon as possible.

urgent.title: Urgent
urgent.subtitle: A quest that needs to be completed urgently. To indicate urgent delivery (from 1 to 24 hours), you need to start the quest almost immediately

top.title: Top Ranked EMP.
top.subtitle: Top ranked employee/employer — this means that there has been a large number of successfully completed quests, with an average score from user reviews of over 4.5 points. Requires passing KYC (verified account), phone number verification, three social media verification, and filling out employment information.

reliable.title: Reliable EMP.
reliable.subtitle: Reliable employee/employer a large number of successfully completed quests, with the average score from user reviews of at least 4 points. Requires passing KYC (verified account), phone number verification and verification in two social networks.

verified.title: Verified EMP.
verified.subtitle: Verified employee/employer is a validated user with a small number of successfully completed quests, and an average user score of at least 3.5 points. Requires passing KYC (verified account) and verification of one of the social networks.

create.title: Create a quest
create.subtitle: Create a work proposal with a detailed description of the task, requirements for candidates and a technical description.

results.title: Search Results
results.subtitle: Search for a job offer by selected search categories.

workers.title: Search Workers
workers.subtitle: Search for workers by selected search categories.

details.title: View details
details.subtitle: Each work proposal (quest) is displayed with basic brief information, the user can use the "View details" button and view all detailed information related to this quest.

map.title: Show map
map.subtitle: Enable or Disable the map to search for employees or employers.

button.title: Share button
button.subtitle: Share your profile or created quest on social networks

raise.title: Raise views
raise.subtitle: Promoting a quest or profile of an employee and employer in the search.

specialization.title: Specialization
specialization.subtitle: List of industries requiring specialized skill sets.

rating.title: Rating
rating.subtitle: Employee rating: Verified employee/Reliable employee/Higher level of trust employee.

priority.title: All priority
priority.subtitle: Priority for delivery: Urgent, Short-term, Fixed Delivery.

distant.title: Distant work
distant.subtitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit ut aliquam, purus sit amet luctus venenatis

price.title: Price
price.subtitle: Filter for finding employees by cost per hour of work, sorted from lowest to highest.

time.title: Added time
time.subtitle: Filter for searching employees by registration date, from new users to early users or vice versa.

specialization.title: Specialization
specialization.subtitle: List of industries requiring special skills.

quests.title: Quests
quests.subtitle: Select a job offer: Quests (all type of work), Specialized quests (task that require specialized skills), permanent job (job search by categories).

delivery.title: Quest delivery time
delivery.subtitle: Quest delivery time: Urgent, Short term, Fixed delivery.

job.title: Type of employment
job.subtitle: Select the type of employment: Full-time, Part-time, Fixed term, Contract.

distant.title: Distant work
distant.subtitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit ut aliquam, purus sit amet luctus venenatis

price.title: Price
price.subtitle: A filter to search for quests, ordered from the lowest price to the highest.

time.title: Added time
time.subtitle: Filter to search for quests by publication date, from the newest to the latest created, or vice versa.

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Comments and reviews that users leave about each other after completing the quest.

active.title: Active quests
active.subtitle: The quest in which you are currently active.

invited.title: Invited quests
invited.subtitle: List of quests that you have been invited to complete.

favorite.title: Favorite
favorite.subtitle: A quest that is added to favorites for frequent interaction.

goldPlus.title: Gold Plus Package
goldPlus.subtitle: Notifications for employees who were looking for quests, via an offer to review the quest that has been promoted by the employer. The employee will be invited to complete the quest in based on the most recent search categories of the employee. Plus the ability to choose any category and any location to promote the quest.

gold.title: Gold package
gold.subtitle: Notifications for employees who were looking for quests with a direct offer to review the promoted quest based on the most recent search categories of the employee. Plus the ability to choose three categories and three locations to promote the quest.

silver.title: Silver package
silver.subtitle: Pin quest on the main page for three hours, with the ability to choose two categories and two locations for promotion the quest.

bronze.title: Bronze package
bronze.subtitle: Pin the quest on the main page for one hour, with the ability to choose one category and one location to promote the quest.
